fractiondemo

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fraction

        public Fraction(int numeratorArgument,
                int denominatorArgument)
        Constructor with defined numerator and denominator values. Denominator can not be set to zero. If denominatorArgument is zero the Fraction is initialized with numerator = 0 and denominator =1. In the constructor, also GCD is determined and the Reduced Numerator and Reduced Denominator are calculated.
        Parameters:
        numeratorArgument - the numerator of the fraction
        denominatorArgument - the denominator of the fraction

      • Fraction

        public Fraction()
        Constructor without initial numerator and denominator values. Default value for numerator = 0, and for denominator = 1. In the constructor, also GCD is determined and the Reduced Numerator and Reduced Denominator are calculated. Since numerator = 0 and denominator = 1 GCD is 1.

      • isEqualInReducedForm

        public boolean isEqualInReducedForm(Fraction otherFraction)
        Compares this Fraction with another Fraction based on the reduced numerator and denominator. For example the method returns true if 2/4 is compared with 1/2.
        Parameters:
        otherFraction - the fraction object with which to compare
        Returns:
        true if this fraction is the same in reduced form as otherFraction in reduced form
